questions: Is there a man in a yellow suit in the image?
Is there a man in a black sweater in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: one man is wearing a blue suit while the other man is wearing a green sweater?
Is the yellow suit a clothing item worn by one of the men?
Is the black sweater a clothing item worn by one of the men?
model_output:
No, there is not a man in a yellow suit in the image. There is only one man in a yellow suit.
Yes, there is a man in a black sweater in the image. The man is wearing a black sweater underneath the yellow suit.
No, the image does not present a differentiation logic: one man is wearing a blue suit while the other man is wearing a green sweater. There is only one man in a yellow suit.
Yes, the yellow suit is a clothing item worn by one of the men. The man is wearing it.
Yes, the black sweater is a clothing item worn by one of the men. The man in the yellow suit is wearing it underneath.
